{Talos}

    Talos arrived in the CR chamber room and looked over the monitor
applying to their recent guest. Examining it slowly his optics widened as
the system specks were rather...unique...for a predicon. Shifting and moving
from behind the console the bot moved to the CR chamber and pushed the
release switch.

    As the chamber door slid upwards he noted the predicon was both awake
and waiting, he had expected some resistance but then again considering her
configuration it wasn't a big surprise. "My name is Talos and you are now a
guest of the Maximals."

    Nightshade looked at Talos and shrugged, moving out of the chamber
looking up at him, "Nightshade, you really should do something about that
bird bot of yours. Even we know what white flag conditions mean."

    Talos tilted his head, Sunhawk hadn't mentioned that his prisoner had
been taken while under truce conditions. Sighing he shrugged, "It changes
very little I assume you were looking for something and I want to know
what." He said gruffly indicating the fem bot should walk before him from
the room.

    Walking out Nightshade wasn't suprised to hear the soft click of a
readied weapon behind her. "I came seeking the maximal leader of this troop,
I have business to discuss with him or her. Mind escorting me to your leader
rather than the brig?"

    Talos chuckled the nozzle of the pistol prodding her back, "Well state
your business, you've met him."

    Nightshade turned looking at Talos skepticly, "How do I know you're
telling the truth, the current example of maximals in this troop have been
less than honorable..." Her voice dropped low her tone almost insulting.
"Besides what I need to discuss has to be done away from prying optics and
sensors. Know a place?"

    Talos nodded grimly indicating the direction towards the bridges ready
room, an office of sorts for commanders of a ship. Putting away the pistol
both Talos and Nightshade moved to the room.
